coursename: LAAD 210 Oral Communication in the U.S. Classroom: Strategies for International T.A.s
description: Seminar for international graduate students who speak English as a second or foreign language. Focuses on oral competency and serves to qualify students as graduate teaching assistants in UCSC classrooms or laboratories.
extrarequirements: Requirements Enrollment is restricted to international graduate students; language assessment administered by the Graduate Division.
fulldesc:
LAAD 210 Oral Communication in the U.S. Classroom: Strategies for International T.A.s
Seminar for international graduate students who speak English as a second or foreign language. Focuses on oral competency and serves to qualify students as graduate teaching assistants in UCSC classrooms or laboratories.
Credits 2
Instructor The Staff
Requirements Enrollment is restricted to international graduate students; language assessment administered by the Graduate Division.
Quarter Offered Fall
